featured.text: The barking of the hound, which drives deer to panic, strengthens the effect of the warning noise, according to the RTRI.
It aims to encourage full utilization of each fish caught, and to strengthen innovation in seafood products.

definition.zh_def: 增強，使更強大或更有效。
definition.en_def: To make something stronger or more powerful.
definition.example: We need to strengthen our team's communication skills.
